column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went here on a a whim with coworkers during a work trip. The lychee mojito was very good
column2: we all kept guzzling them down . For appetizers
column3: we ordered the fried brussel sprouts and the edamame. They were good but not mind blowing. For main course
column4: I had the chicken cheese ramen
column6: I only wish I had gotten the spicy version instead.
